content.text:
# Leadership approval opinion polling for the next United Kingdom general election

At various dates in the run up to the next United Kingdom general election various organisations have carried out opinion polling to gauge the opinions that voters hold towards political leaders. Most of the polling companies listed are members of the British Polling Council (BPC) and abide by its disclosure rules. The dates of the polls range from the previous general election on 4 July 2024 to the present.
Preferred prime minister polling
Some pollsters ask voters which of the party leaders they would prefer as prime minister.
